ovdesc.p: Loan origination process involves a step for calculating external score. Generation of external score for an applicant is optional. This table is used to store the information on the above mentioned transaction. The option for generating external score, score being satisfactory or not, value of external score, customer id and application form id gets stored here. The information on whether the user has opted to generate an external score for a particular applicant can be retrived from this table.

desc.p: The option to generate internal score is to be given here. If selected as "Yes" the internal score card is generated.
The field is also used to select the option as "Yes" or "No" on score being satisfactory.
Only allowed values are YES and NO
